exceedsLimit: The selected file exceeds the {{maxSize}} file limit

login.title: Log in - EarlyBird
login.description: Log in to your account or <1>create an account</1> for free
login.heading: ðŸ‘‹ Welcome back!

signUp.title: Sign up - EarlyBird
signUp.heading: Create an account
signUp.description: Get started for free, no credit card required.
signUp.name: Your name
signUp.agreeWith: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password - EarlyBird
forgotPassword.heading: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.description: We'll send you an email with verification code.

resetPassword.title: $t(resetPassword.heading) - EarlyBird
resetPassword.heading: Reset password
resetPassword.description: We've sent you an email with a 6-digit verification code, please check your inbox.
resetPassword.passwordMismatch: Your new password and repeat password do not match.

account.title: Account - EarlyBird
account.heading: Account
account.description: Changes to account will apply to all of your products.

avatar.heading: Avatar
avatar.description: Gravatar is the default avatar used for EarlyBird, but you can upload your own custom avatar here.

dangerZone.heading: Danger zone
dangerZone.description: This will permanently delete your entire account, including all your landing pages, conversions, and members.
dangerZone.tip1: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your entire account. All workspaces you created will be deleted, and you will be removed from all shared workspaces.
dangerZone.tip2: If you are sure you want to proceed with the deletion of your account, please continue below.
dangerZone.tip3: We have scheduled your account deletion in 48 hours. You will receive an email confirmation when it has completed.
dangerZone.tip4: You will now be logged out.
dangerZone.deletionAlert: Your account has been scheduled for deletion
dangerZone.alertTip1: All of your account data, including but not limited to workspaces, projects, forms and submissions will be permanently deleted within {{remainingTime}} hours of the deletion request.
dangerZone.alertTip2: If this was done in error, you can cancel the deletion of your account below.
dangerZone.canceledText: Your account is no longer scheduled for deletion

billing.title: Billing - EarlyBird
billing.heading: Billing
billing.description: Manage your billing information and invoices.

plan.title: Plans - EarlyBird
plan.heading: Plans
plan.description: You are currently on the {{planName}} plan.
plan.upgrade: You have successfully upgraded to the {{planName}} plan.
plan.downgrade: You have successfully downgraded to the {{planName}} plan.

engagements.title: Conversions

notFound.title: You don't have any conversions yet
notFound.description: Share your landing page with others, and get them involved.

engagements.heading: Conversions
engagements.description: Start engaging with potential buyers and communities.

integrations.heading: Integrate with apps
integrations.description: Connect your conversions data with your favorite apps.

member.heading: Members
member.description: Give your teammates access to this landing page and start collaboration in real time.

removeModal.heading: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
removeModal.description: Once you confirm to remove this member, member will no longer have access to this landing page data.

leaveModal.heading: Are you sure you want to leave this landing page?
leaveModal.description: Once you confirm to leave this landing page, you will no longer have access to this landing page data.

productSettings.title: Landing page Settings
productSettings.heading: Settings
productSettings.updated: Landing page settings have been updated successfully

language.heading: Language
language.description: Choose the language in which visitors will view your site. This applies to text that has not been customized by you, such as default buttons, errors, etc.

domain.description: Landing page shared to web will be under

sitePrivate.heading: Make the site private
sitePrivate.description: Secure your landing page with a single, easy-to-remember password. All SEO and social media capabilities will be deactivated.
sitePrivate.invalidPassword: Your password should be between 4 and 16 characters.
sitePrivate.placeholder: Set the password for the site

removeBranding.heading: Remove EarlyBird branding
removeBranding.description: Remove "Made with EarlyBird" badge on your page.

metaData.heading: Meta data
metaData.description: Set how your landing page is displayed on the web and when shared on social media
metaData.title: Meta title

deleteProduct.heading: Delete the landing page
deleteProduct.description: Beware! Deleting the landing page will result in the permanent loss of all conversions, members, and data - they cannot be recovered!
deleteProduct.success: The landing page has been deleted successfully

deleteProductModal.warn1: Keep in mind this operation is irreversible and will permanently delete all the data associated with this landing page.
deleteProductModal.warn2: Once you confirm to delete the landing page, you will no longer have access to the landing page data.

createProduct.title: Create a landing page
createProduct.name: Landing page name
createProduct.invalidDomain: The domain must have at least 3 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, number or "-"
createProduct.createProductDesc: To begin, please enter the required fields like name, tagline, and public site URL. Click on Create the landing page after that.
createProduct.invalidLogo: The logo is not allowed to be empty
createProduct.invalidName: The name is not allowed to be empty
createProduct.invalidTagline: The tagline is not allowed to be empty
createProduct.invalidDescription: The description is not allowed to be empty
createProduct.invalidTemplate: The template is not allowed to be empty
